resources.string: The goal of BreakIn is to clear out all the bricks on the screen and achieve the highest score possible. \nIf the ball goes past the paddle, a percentage of the score will be deducted. The game is over when all the bricks have been cleared.
Hard Brick\nLike Normal Brick, but takes a few more hits to break it
Speedup Brick\nSpeeds up the ball for a few seconds
Slowdown Brick\nSlowes down the ball for a few seconds
Bigger Paddle Brick\nMakes the paddle bigger for a few seconds
Core Brick\nBreaking this awards a large amount of points, and ends the game
